segments.text: Why don ’ t you sit down and relax , darling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , come and talk to me then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I turn on the radio then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Turn on the radio ? What for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So that we can sit down together and listen to some music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Listen to some music ? And who ’ ll cook dinner ? Will you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I will . But let ’ s go to a disco after dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To a disco ? Oh , no . You know I hate pop .
segments.speaker: S2
